lead_paragraph: The Marine Corps said trainers faced possible legal or administrative action over recurrent abuse at the camp in South Carolina where the recruit died.

headline.print_headline: 20 Marines Face Discipline After Muslim Recruit’s Death Is Ruled a Suicide
headline.main: 20 Marines Face Discipline After Muslim Recruit’s Death Is Ruled a Suicide

snippet: The Marine Corps said trainers faced possible legal or administrative action over recurrent abuse at the camp in South Carolina where the recruit died....
abstract: Marine Corps officials announce that investigation into death of Muslim recruit Raheel Siddiqui has identified 20 trainers at training camp in Parris Island, SC, for possible legal or administrative action; statement rules death as suicide; investigation focused on accusations of abuse and hazing of recruits at camp.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
